text: Jiang Xin (; born 18 January 1969) is a Chinese former badminton player who later move to Australia and run a badminton school in Melbourne. He was the bronze medalists at the 1994 Asian Games in the men's doubels and team events. Jiang competed at the 1996 Summer Olympics in the men's doubles teamed-up with Huang Zhanzhong. == Achievements == === World Cup === Mixed doubles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" !
